transcript: Then I'll get to see you now, I get to see you later at least, you know. You gotta keep it all from me, alright?

segments.text: Then I'll get to see you now, I get to see you later at least, you know. You gotta keep it all from me, alright?

metadata.transcript_ground_truth: If I don't get to see it now, I get to see it later at least, you know?  You've got to keep it all for me; all right?
